40837.name: Percentage of teachers in upper secondary education who are trained, both sexes (%)
40837.description: Number of teachers who have received the minimum organized teacher training (pre-service or in-service) required for teaching at the upper secondary level in the given country, expressed as a percentage of the total number of teachers at the upper secondary level.
